author: Inga Ting, Alex Palmer And Stephen Hutcheon
title: Mapping the lockdown effect: How coronavirus turned cities into ghost towns
description: City after city has fallen silent as desperate governments implore or compel residents to stay indoors. These charts show Australian cities are no exception.
content:
Posted 
April 05, 2020 04:48:41
Abandoned playgrounds. Empty highways. Bustling streets now all but deserted. 
City after city has fallen silent as desperate governments implore or compel residents to stay indoors in a bid to stymie the devastating spread … [+19108 chars]
